goal.ch:
- 瞭解空氣污染的形成原因
- 瞭解空氣污染的形成過程
- 研習空氣污染的控制原理
- 研習空氣污染的控制方法
- 研習空氣污染觀測資料的使用和應用
- 研讀國際上最近的環境相關報導
- 進行有趣的動手做實驗
- 校外教學

outline.ch:
Outline of the course
1. Fundamentals
-Basic Physical and Chemical Principles
-Indoor and Outdoor Air Pollution
- Source and Dispersion of Pollutants
2. Effects of Exposure to Air Pollution
-The Toxic Effects of Air Pollutants
-Assessment of Health Risks
3. Constraints and Controls
-Air pollution Legislation and Regulations
-Formation and Control of Pollutants in Combustion Systems
-Uncontrolled Pollutant Emission Rates

textbook.ch:
“1. Heinsohn, R.J., and R.L. Kabel, Sources and Control of Air Pollution, 1998.
2. Turco, R.P., Earth Under Siege. From Air Pollution to Global Change, 1997.
3. Brimblecombe, P., Air Composition and Chemistry, 1986.
4. Wayne, R.P., Chemistry of Atmosphere, 2000.
5. van Loon, G.W., and S.J. Duffy, Environmental Chemistry, 2000.“

“1. Heinsohn, R.J., and R.L. Kabel, Sources and Control of Air Pollution, 1998.
